verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>فَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ صَفًّا
verses.translation: В знак тех, кто строится в ряды

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>زّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>جِر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ زَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11312'>جْ</tajweed>رًا
verses.translation: Отталкивая силой (грех)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>تَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: Читая наставление (Господне)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَكُمْ لَو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.translation: Поистине, ваш Бог - Един

verses.text_uthmani: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: رَّبُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6926'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':177'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11313'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَشَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>ِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Rabbus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bainahumā wa rabbul-masyāriq(i).
verses.translation: Тот, Кто владеет небесами и землей И всем, что между ними (пребывает), Владыка всех восходов солнца

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا زَيَّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11314'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11315'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11316'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَوَاكِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: Поистине, Мы небеса, ближайшие к земле, Покрыли украшением из звезд

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَحِفْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11317'>ظًا م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':843'>ن ك</tajweed>ُلِّ شَيْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11318'>نٍ م</tajweed>َّارِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ḥifẓam min kulli syaiṭānim mārid(in).
verses.translation: (Для красоты), а также для охраны От всякого мятежного шайтана

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَّا يَسَّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َعُونَ إِلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1384'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلَإِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11319'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11320'>قْ</tajweed>ذَفُونَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':843'>ن ك</tajweed>ُلِّ جَانِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lā yassammā'ūna ilal-mala'il-a'lā wa yuqżafūna min kulli jānib(in).
verses.translation: Чтобы к Верховному Собранию (святых) Прислушиваться не могли они И были изгнаны со всех сторон

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: دُحُو<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11321'>رًا‌ۖ و</tajweed>َلَهُمْ عَذَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11322'>بٌ و</tajweed>َاصِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ٌ
verses.translation: Отогнаны и преданы мучительному наказанью

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11323'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11324'>طْ</tajweed>فَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> شِهَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11325'>بٌ ث</tajweed>َاقِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Illā man khaṭifal-khaṭfata fa'atba'ahū syihābun ṡāqib(un).
verses.translation: Помимо тех, Кто крадучись урвет что-либо, И их преследует пылающий огнем Слепящий светоч (падающих звезд)

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍۭ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أ<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':3110'>َم م</tajweed>َّنْ خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5159'>قْ</tajweed>ن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۚ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11326'>قْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11327'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3917'>ن ط</tajweed>ِي<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11328'>نٍ ل</tajweed>َّازِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ِۭ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fastaftihim ahum asyaddu khalqan am man khalaqnā, innā khalaqnāhum min ṭīnil lāzib(in).
verses.translation: Ты их спроси: "Какое из творений Наших Труднее было Нам создать: Их или все другое? Ведь Мы их создали из липкой глины

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلْ عَجِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11329'>بْ</tajweed>تَ وَيَسْخَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Дивишься ты (могуществу Аллаха), Они же все насмешкам подвергают

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لَا يَذْكُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Когда увещевают их, Они все обращают ни во что

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِذَا رَأَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> ءَايَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11330'>ةً ي</tajweed>َسْتَسْخِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Когда глазам их предстает знамение (Господне), Они его высмеивают дерзко

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِنْ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَّا سِحْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3879'>رٌ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qālū in hāżā illā siḥrum mubīn(un).
verses.translation: И говорят: "Сие - лишь явно колдовство

verses.text_uthmani: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا تُرَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9207'>بًا و</tajweed>َعِظَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مًا أَءِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَمَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7784'>بْ</tajweed>عُوث<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: A'iżā mitnā wa kunnā turābaw wa 'iẓāman a'innā lamab'ūṡūn(a).
verses.translation: Ужель, когда умрем и станем прахом и костьми, Мы будем вновь воскрешены (на Суд)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَوَءَاب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓؤُنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11331'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَوَّل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И мы, и наши праотцы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':98'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ د<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>خِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Скажи им: "Да! И будете бесчестием покрыты

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَا هِىَ زَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11332'>جْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11333'>ةٌ و</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>حِدَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11334'>ةٌ ف</tajweed>َإِذَا هُمْ يَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1141'>نظ</tajweed>ُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa'innamā hiya zajratuw wāḥidatun fa'iżā hum yanẓurūn(a).
verses.translation: Один лишь вскрик - И к ним придет прозренье

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>وَيْلَنَا هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا يَوْمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11335'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qālū yā wailanā hāżā yaumud-dīn(i).
verses.translation: И взмолят (они): "О, горе нам! Ведь это Судный День настал

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا يَوْمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11336'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَصْلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11337'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6084'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: (И голос прозвучит): "Сие День Разделения настал, Который вы считали ложью

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ ٱحْشُرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11338'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَأَزْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>جَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَعْبُد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Uḥsyurul-lażīna ẓalamū wa azwājahum wa mā kānū ya'budūn(a).
verses.translation: И будет сказано: "Собрать всех нечестивых и собратьев их И все, чему они

verses.text_uthmani: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':107'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':108'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11339'>ٱ</tajweed>هْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>طِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11340'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Помимо Бога, поклонялись, И отвести на путь, ведущий в огнь Ада

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقِفُوهُمْ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11341'>ُم م</tajweed>َّسْــُٔول<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Но отначала их остановить, - Ведь будут спрошены они

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Что с вами происходит? Что ж не окажете вы помощи друг другу

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلْ هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11342'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: В тот День Они смиренны и покорны будут

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11343'>قْ</tajweed>بَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11344'>ضٍ ي</tajweed>َتَس<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Они с вопросами друг к другу обратятся

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7424'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: И скажут: "Ведь приходили к нам вы с правой стороны

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Другие им ответят: "Нет! Вы сами были нечестивы

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَـٰنٍۭ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَـٰغِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':548'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4798'>ن س</tajweed>ُلْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':11345'>نِۭ‌ۖ ب</tajweed>َلْ كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ قَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11346'>مًا ط</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>غ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā kāna lanā 'alaikum min sulṭān(in), bal kuntum qauman ṭāgīn(a).
verses.translation: И мы над вами не имели власти никакой. Нет! Это вы в излишествах упрямы были

verses.text_uthmani: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ ۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۖ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa ḥaqqa 'alainā qaulu rabbinā, innā lażā'iqūn(a).
verses.translation: Так Слово Господа над нами оправдалось, И мы, поистине, познаем вкус Его (бича)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَغْوَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كُمْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا غَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Мы заблудили вас лишь потому, Что сами были в заблужденье

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ يَوْمَئِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11347'>ذٍ ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10442'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Поистине, в тот День Соединит их всех Господня кара

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا كَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11348'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11348'>جْ</tajweed>رِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Так поступаем с грешниками Мы

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ كَان<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَ إِلَّا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1742'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innahum kānū iżā qīla lahum lā ilāha illallāhu yastakbirūn(a).
verses.translation: А ведь когда им говорили: "Нет божества, кроме Аллаха", Переполняла их гордыня

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍۭ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَتَارِك<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11349'>رٍ م</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11350'>جْ</tajweed>ن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِۭ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yaqūlūna a'innā latārikū ālihatinā lisyā'irim majnūn(in).
verses.translation: И молвили они: "Ужель оставим мы своих богов Ради безумного поэта

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلْ ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':370'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11351'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُرْسَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Но нет! Он с Истиной пришел И утвердил посланников (Господних), Пришедших ранее, в другие времена

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ لَذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11352'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَذَابِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11353'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Поистине, познаете вы вкус Мучительной Господней кары

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا تُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4248'>جْ</tajweed>زَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَعْمَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā tujzauna illā mā kuntum ta'malūn(a).
verses.translation: Сие - не боле чем расплата За все содеянное (на земле)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا عِبَادَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11354'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11355'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُخْلَص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Для искренних и верных слуг Господних

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11356'>قٌ م</tajweed>َّعْل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مٌ
verses.translation: Надел, что Господом назначен

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>كِهُ‌ۖ وَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11357'>ُم م</tajweed>ُّكْرَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Плоды, (несущие усладу), И быть им в славе и почете

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3680'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: В Садах блаженства и утех

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَلَىٰ سُرُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7259'>رٍ م</tajweed>ُّتَقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: На ложах, лица повернув друг к другу

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يُطَافُ عَلَيْه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11358'>ِم ب</tajweed>ِكَأْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11359'>سٍ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11360'>ِن م</tajweed>َّع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِۭ
verses.translation: Их с чашей будут обходить, Наполненною ключевой водою

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَيْض<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ لَذَّ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11361'>ةٍ ل</tajweed>ِّلشَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Прозрачной, как хрусталь, - Для истинной утехи тех, Кто пить ее изволит

verses.text_uthmani: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَا فِيهَا غَوْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11362'>لٌ و</tajweed>َلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11363'>نز</tajweed>َف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lā fīhā gauluw wa lā hum 'anhā yunzafūn(a).
verses.translation: И от которой им не будет Ни боли головной, ни ослабленья

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَعِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11364'>ند</tajweed>َهُمْ قَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>صِر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11365'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طَّرْفِ ع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.translation: Им будут девы большеоки, Смиренно опустившие глаза

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ بَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11366'>ضٌ م</tajweed>َّكْن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نٌ
verses.translation: Подобны тщательно хранимым яйцам

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11367'>قْ</tajweed>بَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11344'>ضٍ ي</tajweed>َتَس<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Они приблизятся с расспросами друг к другу

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ قَآئِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ ق<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':6558'>لٌ م</tajweed>ِّنْهُمْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى كَانَ لِى قَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla qā'ilum minhum innī kāna lī qarīn(un).
verses.translation: И вот один из них начнет: "Имел я друга на земле

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَقُولُ أَءِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ لَمِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11368'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُصَدِّق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Который говорил обычно: "Ужель ты из числа таких, Кто истиной (Послание) считает

verses.text_uthmani: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا تُرَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9207'>بًا و</tajweed>َعِظَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مًا أَءِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَمَدِين<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: A'iżā mitnā wa kunnā turāban a'innā lamadīnūn(a).
verses.translation: Ужель, когда умрем и станем прахом и костьми, Мы будем призваны на Суд

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ هَلْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed><tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11369'>ُم م</tajweed>ُّطَّلِع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Ответит тот: "Хотел бы ты взглянуть: (что там)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>طَّلَعَ فَرَءَاهُ فِى سَو<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11370'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: И он взглянул - И в сердцевине огненного Ада узрел его

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ تَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6760'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11371'>ن ك</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='idgh_mus' data-type='idgham-mutajanisayn' data-description='Idgham - Mutajanisayn' data-tajweed=':7842'>د</tajweed>تَّ لَتُرْد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: И так сказал: "Клянусь Аллахом! Ты на погибель мог меня обречь

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11372'>نت</tajweed>ُ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10216'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُحْضَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa lau lā ni'matu rabbī lakuntu minal-muḥḍarīn(a).
verses.translation: Не будь на то Господня милость, Я был бы среди тех, кто был туда повержен

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّت<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Ужель другая смерть нас не постигнет

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11373'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Illā mautatunal-ūlā wa mā naḥnu bimu'ażżabīn(a).
verses.translation: Помимо той, которой мы уже подверглись, И мы не будет преданы мученьям

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا لَهُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11374'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَوْزُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2633'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مُ
verses.translation: Сие - поистине, найвысшая награда

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِمِثْلِ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11375'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Чтоб возыметь подобную (усладу), Усердствуют пусть все, В ком праведность и тщание живут

verses.text_uthmani: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11376'>رٌ ن</tajweed>ُّزُلاً أَمْ شَجَرَةُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11377'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>زَّقّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: И что чудесней: этот пир или плоды заккума

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا جَعَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَا فِتْنَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11378'>ةً ل</tajweed>ِّلظَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Мы испытанием устроили его для нечестивых

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَا شَجَرَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11379'>ةٌ ت</tajweed>َخْرُجُ ف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَصْلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11380'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Ведь это - древо, что корнями в Ад уходит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: طَلْعُهَا كَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> رُءُوسُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11381'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ط<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Плоды его ветвей подобны дьявольским главам

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَـَٔاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ لَأَكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِــُٔونَ مِنْهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11382'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبُط<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa innahum la'ākilūna minhā fa māli'ūna minhal-buṭūn(a).
verses.translation: И от него они едят И наполняют им свои желудки

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11383'>بًا م</tajweed>ِّنْ حَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma inna lahum 'alaihā lasyaubam min ḥamīm(in).
verses.translation: Потом же им дадут испить Питье с кипящею водою

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11384'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Потом - обратный путь в Огонь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ أَلْفَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> ءَاب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَهُمْ ض<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓلّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Поистине, они отцов своих заблудшими нашли

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَهُمْ عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> ءَاثَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِهِمْ يُهْرَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И сами погнаны по их следам (мучений)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> ضَلَّ قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8394'>بْ</tajweed>لَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11385'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَوَّل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Поистине, еще до них Так много древних заблуждалось

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> أَرْسَلْنَا فِيه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11386'>ِم م</tajweed>ُّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11387'>نذ</tajweed>ِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Но увещателей Своих Мы им и прежде посылали

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1513'>نظ</tajweed>ُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قِبَةُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6136'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6137'>نذ</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Теперь же посмотри, каков конец был тех, Кого они увещевали

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا عِبَادَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11354'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11355'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُخْلَص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Помимо искренних служителей Аллаха

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> نَادَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>نَا نُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11388'>حٌ ف</tajweed>َلَنِعْمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11389'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُجِيب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: (В те времена) воззвал к Нам Нух, Мы ж - лучшие ответчики на все призывы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَنَجَّيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ وَأَهْلَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8815'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَرْبِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8816'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: И от беды великой спасли Мы и его, и род его

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11390'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَاق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Мы жить оставили его потомков

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9784'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И Мы оставили над ним В народах, что пришли потом, (Благословение Господне)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مٌ عَلَىٰ نُو<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11391'>حٍ ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11392'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Да будет Нуху мир во всех мирах

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا كَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4214'>جْ</tajweed>زِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4215'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُحْسِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Так Мы вознаграждаем добротворцев

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مِنْ عِبَادِنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11393'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Ведь был он из числа уверовавших слуг Господних

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ أَغْرَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9772'>قْ</tajweed>نَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9773'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Потом Мы потопили остальных

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':10087'>ن ش</tajweed>ِيعَتِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> لَإِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11394'>بْ</tajweed>ر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مَ
verses.translation: Средь тех, кто следовал его путем, Был Ибрахим

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذْ ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ رَبَّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بِقَلْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':9790'>بٍ س</tajweed>َل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: Когда он с сердцем непорочным Пришел к Владыке своему

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> مَاذَا تَعْبُد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iż qāla li'abīhi wa qaumihī māżā ta'budūn(a).
verses.translation: Когда сказал отцу и своему народу: "Чему же поклоняетесь вы все

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَئِفْكًا ءَالِهَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11395'>ةً د</tajweed>ُونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11396'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ تُرِيد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Неужто ложь - (принятие) других богов кроме Аллаха - Желает (ваше сердце)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَا ظَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11397'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِرَبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4930'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И как вы мыслите Владыку всех миров

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11398'>ةً ف</tajweed>ِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11399'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Затем он бросил взгляд на звезды

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَقَالَ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى سَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.translation: И сказал: "Поистине, я болен (И не могу присутствовать на вашем пире)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَتَوَلَّوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَنْهُ مُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5528'>دْ</tajweed>بِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И отвернулись от него они и прочь ушли

verses.text_uthmani: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَرَاغَ إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Farāga ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā ta'kulūn(a).
verses.translation: Тогда он к их богам подкрался и сказал: "Что ж не едите вы (оставленные подношенья)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11400'>نط</tajweed>ِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Что с вами, лишены вы дара речи

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْب<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':11401'>َۢا ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11402'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: И он (поближе) подошел к ним, (По ним) ударив правою рукой

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11403'>قْ</tajweed>بَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَيْهِ يَزِفّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Потом поспешно там собрались люди

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِت<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И он сказал: "Вы поклоняетесь тому, что иссекли вы сами

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Бог сотворил и вас, и дело ваших рук

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَـٰنًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11404'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8016'>بْ</tajweed>نُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> بُنْيَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11405'>نًا ف</tajweed>َأَلْقُوهُ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11406'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Они сказали: "Топку для него постройте И бросьте его в огненное пламя". [Когда же милостью Господней От жара пламени он был спасен]

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَرَادُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> كَيْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8801'>دًا ف</tajweed>َجَعَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11407'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَسْفَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: На ум пришли им хитроумные уловки, Но Мы заставили униженно смириться их

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالَ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qāla innī żāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīn(i).
verses.translation: И он сказал: "Я к Богу моему иду, - Он, истинно, мне правый путь укажет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: رَبِّ هَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':1878'>بْ</tajweed> لِى مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1889'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Господь мой! Дай мне праведного (сына)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَبَشَّرْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ بِغُلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مٍ حَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: И Мы послали Весть ему благую О добронравном, кротком сыне

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَـٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11408'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّعْىَ قَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُنَىَّ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَرَىٰ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11409'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَنَامِ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَذْبَحُكَ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1513'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1513'>نظ</tajweed>ُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ‌ۚ قَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَبَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11410'>ٱ</tajweed>فْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ‌ۖ سَتَجِدُن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':364'>ن ش</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':78'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8837'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falammā balaga ma'ahus-sa'ya qāla yā bunayya innī arā fil-manāmi annī ażbaḥuka fanẓur māżā tarā, qāla yā abatif'al mā tu'mar(u), satajidunī in syā'allāhu minaṣ-ṣābirīn(a).
verses.translation: И вот, когда он возраста труда достиг, Отец сказал: "Мой сын! Я видел сон, Что жертвенным убоем Тебя я (Богу) приношу. Ты посмотри, что мыслится тебе об этом". И сын сказал: "О мой отец! Ты делай то, что велено тебе, И ты найдешь, что я - коли угодно Богу - Найду в себе смирение и твердость

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لِلْجَب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Когда же оба предались Господней Воле И сына на чело отец уже поверг

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11411'>َن ي</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>إِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6429'>بْ</tajweed>ر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مُ
verses.translation: Воззвали Мы: "О Ибрахим

verses.text_uthmani: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':298'>دْ</tajweed> صَدَّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11412'>قْ</tajweed>تَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11413'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رُّءْي<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۚ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا كَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4214'>جْ</tajweed>زِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4215'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُحْسِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Ты оправдал уже видение свое!" Мы так вознаграждаем добротворцев

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا لَهُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11414'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ؤُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11415'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نُ
verses.translation: Сие, поистине, (Господне) испытанье

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَفَدَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ بِذِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11416'>بْ</tajweed>حٍ عَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: И искупили (сына) Мы его великой жертвой

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9784'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И Мы оставили над ним В народах, что пришли потом, (Благословение Господне)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: سَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مٌ عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':1860'>بْ</tajweed>ر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مَ
verses.translation: Да будет Ибрахиму мир

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4214'>جْ</tajweed>زِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4215'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُحْسِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Так Мы вознаграждаем добротворцев

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مِنْ عِبَادِنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11393'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Ведь был он Нашим праведным слугою
